Articles.Content:
im at (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan

Anyone knows whats the release time on that time zone ?

plz plz =D

Ty !

inb4 thread lock:

Nobody knows. Literally nobody at all.
Usually around 1200-1300 Mexico City time. Don't get your hopes up though and just be patient.

It's SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢.

Probably Thursday.

in November......2017.

Not saying which Thursday though.

Or maybe 59 minutes!

Who knows..

(also inb4 lock)
I hope Squad films HarvestR pushing the button to publish it... he deserves it.
TLDR, no one knows.
Speculator! He has spoken the forbidden Topic, and now the thread shalt be locked!

In this instance I'd say it shouldn't be locked simply because this isn't just a regular update, but the actual release. Most digital games usually specify an hour they become available. That being said if you have KSP through Steam it usually updates at 1pm EST.

inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock inb4lock

edit: Dammit, wrong thread to pray for a lock. xD

> I hope Squad films HarvestR pushing the button to publish it... he deserves it.

Yes! The final "hype video" release should be the TEAM pushing a big red "GO" button.
Probably when the servers finish migrating north. inb4lk
Mods are taking their time to lock this. I reported it like 20 minutes ago.

> 
> Mods are taking their time to lock this. I reported it like 20 minutes ago.

You are no fun.

> 
> Mods are taking their time to lock this. I reported it like 20 minutes ago.

Is it backseat moderation to remind people not to backseat moderate?

This is just a joke :S... nvm.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T03:29:57Z" title="04/27/2015 03:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Fel**
I'm not backseat modding as I never mentioned what was wrong here. I sent a report abuse in a confidential manner- end of discussion.
I expect that it will be after the Monday morning coffee-guzzling and "Are we *sure*?" meetings, but with enough time before "Time to punch out, I hope nothing goes wrong overnight" o'clock.
I just hope the game actually launches instead of being pushed to the next Steam Update Window on tuesday because of bad weather, winds or something like that...
I'm here before the lock! Do I get a cookie? ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)
Obsessively press F5

It came out 35 minutes ago here.

no not really.
Gah. I'm getting tired of watching other people fumble around with poorly designed rockets in 1.0. I want to play!

Weather is a little bad, launch is scrubbed... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Just kidding

> 
> Weather is a little bad, launch is scrubbed... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Just kidding

think about it this way

we can play ksp 1.0 today

spaceX-employees have to launch a rocket and can't play KSP ;-)

(Flight 18, Falcon 1.1, TurkmenAlem52E/MonacoSAT, 22:14 UTC, from Cape Canaveral Pad LC40)

Ariane Space was wiser, they launched yesterday and can go playing KSP 1.0 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT: By the way, I tried to load the ksp-website and got this:

> 
> Server Migration
> Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.
> 
> We appreciate your patience.
> 
> - Squad Team

could it be?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T05:09:15Z" title="04/27/2015 05:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Hotblack Desiato**
There's a boat downrange of the 1.0 launchpad. We can't launch today.

> 
> There's a boat downrange of the 1.0 launchpad. We can't launch today.
